channel.title: Saliva
channel.description:
Does anyone like the band Saliva? Saliva is one of my favorite band, if not the favorite. I tend to listen a lot of them before a race, I have no idea why but all of their songs seem to get me extremely motivated. My favorites are:
[ul][li]Click Click Boom[/li] [li]Always[/li] [li]Ladies and Gentleman[/li][/ul]
If you haven't listened to them, I suggest you do, immediately.

item.title: Saliva

item.description:

Worst lyrics going? I really do not like them sorry.
